originalTitle: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
title: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
content: Following an investigation some of the 16 detained last year are accused of planning to unseat President Bola Tinubu.

originalTitle: Kenyan cult leader faces charges over 52 further deaths
title: Kenyan cult leader faces charges over 52 further deaths
content: Prosecutors say Paul Mackenzie lured the latest victims to their deaths by writing notes from his prison cell.

originalTitle: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
title: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
content: The UN mission says it is gravely concerned by "inflammatory rhetoric calling for violence against civilians".

originalTitle: US dollar: ‘Wounded hegemon’ or secure as most powerful currency on earth?
title: US dollar: ‘Wounded hegemon’ or secure as most powerful currency on earth?
content: Faced with Trump's tariffs and threats, BRICS countries are trying to reduce dollar use in trading with each other.

originalTitle: Who is Iraq’s former leader Nouri al-Maliki?
title: Who is Iraq’s former leader Nouri al-Maliki?
content: Iraq’s dominant Shia political bloc nominated al-Maliki to become prime minister.

originalTitle: LIVE: US, Iran ratchet up rhetoric as ‘big armada’ forms in the Middle East
title: LIVE: US, Iran ratchet up rhetoric as ‘big armada’ forms in the Middle East
content: USS Abraham Lincoln carrier's arrival is 'not going to affect Iran's determination to defend the nation', Tehran warns.

originalTitle: Immigration chief at centre of Trump's crackdown set to leave Minneapolis
title: Immigration chief at centre of Trump's crackdown set to leave Minneapolis
content: The US president is sending border tsar Tom Homan to the city in an apparent shift in tone from the White House.

originalTitle: 'We're all terrified', Minnesotan tells the BBC in tears
title: 'We're all terrified', Minnesotan tells the BBC in tears
content: The BBC's Ana Faguy speaks to residents in the state after the second fatal shooting by federal immigration officers.

originalTitle: India and EU set to announce landmark trade deal
title: India and EU set to announce landmark trade deal
content: The long-awaited deal comes as both Delhi and Brussels contend with economic and geopolitical pressure from the US.

originalTitle: How 'Premier League' Galatasaray can derail Man City
title: How 'Premier League' Galatasaray can derail Man City
content: Needing a positive result to keep their Champions League campaign on track, Galatasaray are not the side Manchester City would choose to face in their final game of the league phase.

originalTitle: Bayern Munich open talks to extend Kane contract
title: Bayern Munich open talks to extend Kane contract
content: Bayern Munich sporting director Max Eberl says the German club are in talks with Harry Kane about extending the striker's contract.

title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
content: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
